topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556a993e63687204e9c70d00#post_556a993e63687204e9c70d00

He was in a coffin; wasn't as if he was just lounging about. And judging by the line of chairs in front, I'd imagine he was the shopkeeper or something. It must have been the scene of a funeral. Why he was still in the store, I have no idea. The lights were off and the door was locked, so I don't know how long he was there. Frankly, I just ran away.


"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556a99546368722406010a00#post_556a99546368722406010a00

I tried to see if I could get into the store, but the door was locked. Boo.
